subject: Problem in running j2meunit in ANT
msgSnippet: Hi, I have the following ant tasks
messageBody:
Hi, I have the following ant tasks

<target name="emulate" depends="jarMidp">
<exec executable="${J2MEWTK.HOME}/bin/emulator" dir="${build.dir}">
<arg line="-Xdescriptor:fitnessbuddy.jad" />
</exec>
</target>

However, when I running unittest in j2meunit application, I have the
following error

[exec] ALERT: Unable to load class j2meunit/framework/TestListener

so I try to involve the classpath as follow:

<target name="emulate" depends="jarMidp">
<exec executable="${J2MEWTK.HOME}/bin/emulator" dir="${build.dir}">
<arg line="-Xdescriptor:fitnessbuddy.jad" />
<arg line="-classpath
${build.dir}/fitnessbuddy_midp.jar:${midp_lib.dir}:${lib.dir}/J2MEUnit1_0.zip"
/>
</exec>
</target>

However, I still can't run the unittest, anyone know how to solve?
